captions.text: Do, do, Oh, what the hell was that?
I got a life to live.
I, I might have a family some day.
How do I even get past this one?

Why do I have to go through these things
for your entertainment.
I did not know that was going to happen.
It's all one big booby trap.
What's the point of doing double?
I knew it was going to be tricksies.

huh yeah, go over, oh I was going to go
over it.
There's a big, open area here.
Wawa I wasn't even near it.

what the fucking hell, i am so close, i
got!

Continue with the bouncing strategy,
fudge.
You son of a bitch, that's a trap.
Fuck you, there is a trap!

And, then, stay here, and then jump over,
and then jump.
And, fuck, I'm going to die.
All right, I'm just going to jump for it.
My life is filled with such pain.
Is that going to be enough?
I don't care, here I go,
Well, what the tent's in Magoo.
My whole life is a lie.
Torn down like the pillars of society.

This has been the Unfair Mario
Compilation.
If you enjoyed my pain and suffering and

want to see more, why not subscribe to my
channel.
want to help the channel grow.

Add it to your favorites, or share it with
your friends on Facebook and Twitter.

And as always, I will see you, in the next
video.
